sentences.sentence: I'm just saying you can't have it both ways.
sentences.translation: 我只是说鱼和熊掌不可兼得。

sentences.sentence: Real magic in relationships means an absence of judgment of others.
sentences.translation: 良好人际关系的秘诀，在于不对他人做出评判。

sentences.sentence: Life is 10% what happens to you and 90% how you react to it.
sentences.translation: 生活的10%是发生在你身上的事，剩下的90%是你如何应对。

sentences.sentence: The Internet launches a new campaign which dramatically changes our world and our old ways of life.
sentences.translation: 互联网的出现使得我们生活的世界发生了戏剧性的转变，它改变了我们过去的生活方式。
